title: Apt 392, 3rd Floor 1 x 1 Apartment! Available Now Contact Us For Info!
posting_body: We believe elevating where you live is about blending it seamlessly with how you live.
Where you live, is where you come alive.
Experience the rich tradition and heritage provided by the small town atmosphere of Downtown Campbell.

Enjoy a leisure stroll with family and friends to charming shops, sidewalk cafes and restaurants in the pleasant ambiance of the historic district, or unwind at our Olympic-sized pool or state of the art fitness center.
Regardless of your taste, our thoughtfully designed and spacious floor plans provide you with a space you are proud to call home.
Upgrade any home to Furnished+ and enjoy the convenience of turnkey living.
The apartments for rent at Avalon Campbell are as distinct as the town of Campbell itself.
Our charming community is situated very close to a host of amazing shopping and dining venues, as well as some fun local attractions.
For example, you can visit the Campbell Historical Museum or Ainsley House, indulge at the weekly Farmers' Market, or spend a relaxing day at any one of the beautiful parks and gardens in the city.
As a resident of Avalon Campbell you will also have easy access to bus and other public transportation, which ensures you will always be able to get to where you need to be.
In essence, Avalon Campbell is the ideal Bay Area apartment community and we do everything in our power to make your stay with us a wonderful and convenient one.
This is not just apartment living.
This is living up.
-In-Unit Washer/Dryer
-Stainless Steel Appliances
-Pool
-Pet Friendly
-Parking
-Air Conditioning (Select Homes)
-Balcony/Patio
-Controlled Access
